entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -45.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 02:32 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -45.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -50.0°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 45. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 54 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:29 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
